text: The staff were particularly good and a pleasure to deal with Also the breakfast was particularly good too good vegetarian and vegan options which are always essential but done with flair and not just an afterthought Top marks all round
vegetarian vegan food view from the balcony and talking to the chef Good access for wheelchairs
Everything about it. The menu didn t have a good vegetarian vegan option which made it hard for me to have proper meals although the chef did go out of his way to make me something
decent breakfast as it catered for vegans soy milk. room service menu was a little lacking nothing for vegans

If you're looking for a place to stay in London that epitomizes posh and discreet, The Dorchester is it. It's a small fortune to stay there, but you're treated like royalty. Staff bend over backwards for you, rooms are immaculate. Food, drinks are exquisite. I'm vegan and did the vegan high tea -- it's the only thing I found underwhelming of the entire experience as the food wasn't creative or particularly impressive. Everything else about the hotel is though.
Excellent value for money. English Breakfast could have better vegetarian option like good quality Vegetarian sausages
The rooms were good the bathroom was lovely it was peaceful and spacious. No vegan options for food no lock on bathroom doors
A very enjoyable stay and lovely staff. I wish there were more vegan options for breakfast other than just fruit
Room was clean Complimentary drinks was a good treat each day. Breakfast could have more vegetarian options Also restaurant menu could have more children s options and vegetarian choices
Location is excellent. Old hotel breakfast full of pastries only NO vegan gluten free options poor choice of fruits antiquated interiors

Accommodated our vegetarian dietary requirements well at dinner Friendly staff. Room very hot at night and unable to leave windows open due to unpleasant odours from drainage system to rear of building No real vegetarian breakfast option
Realy close to the underground Room was clean but a little small Realy gentle staff Easy to locate 10 minutes walk to Abbey Road plentiful and vegan friendly breakfast. Nothing

Staff was very welcoming and professional Breakfast was great and healthy loved it Even thought of vegan people Hotel is walking distance from a metro and only 3 stops from Duomo It is also near Centrale Station approx 15min walk

Good location not far from Wimbledon centre funny organic Vegan cafe. Old building oddly shaped rooms barely usable shower my room was on the top floor under an angled roof the only way to use the shower was to squat in the tub
The most comfortable bed in a hotel ever Really friendly and helpful staff Fantastic location for exploring Paris Great breakfast with tons of options including for vegan

A nice location easy walking distance to metro bars restaurants Notre Dame and Jardins Luxembourg Safe provided Room size OK Nice artwork decorations. Limited vegan choice for breakfast no milk alternatives and no fresh fruit
It is an amazing hotel I loved everything location comfort services friendliness of the staff and vegan options on the menu One of the best hotels I have stayed in Paris will definitely come back

The room facilities were excellent and the bed was very comfortable Great shower Very clean Staff very helpful and friendly. No view from window Expected better bread selection from a hotel in Vienna Vegan options limited
Good location for our purposes and a good variety of vegetarian dishes for breakfast .
Bed was comfortable n good platter of fresh fruits as we are vegetarians
